name: Epic Epidemic
description:
Play as a virus on Desktop or in VR and infect  the city as fast as you can. 

Avoid the doctors until you can defeat them.

Collect PowerUps to use special abilities.

Special abilities:

RATS

- with every death a rat appears, which infects other people

RUSH

- you move faster

SPREAD

- you drop 5 bombs which, when detonated, will infect all people in their radius.

RAGE

- infected people now run randomly through the area

Try to beat your highscore und have fun!

Let me now if there are any bugs :)

Thanks for playing and stay healthy!
